tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE social_media_campaigns_impact (
  campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  campaign_name TEXT,
  mentions_count INT,
  shares_count INT,
  brand_awareness_rating FLOAT,
  reputation_rating FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE social_media_campaigns (
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    budget DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE campaign_metrics (
    metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_id INT REFERENCES social_media_campaigns(campaign_id),
    mentions INT,
    shares INT,
    brand_awareness_score DECIMAL,
    reputation_score DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE Mentions (
    mention_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_id INT,
    mention_date DATE,
    user_id INT,
    mention_text TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Shares (
    share_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_id INT,
    share_date DATE,
    user_id INT,
    share_platform TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE BrandMetrics (
    metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_id INT,
    metric_date DATE,
    brand_awareness_score INT,
    brand_reputation_score INT
);

CREATE TABLE mentions (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_id INT NOT NULL,
    mention_date DATE,
    user_id INT,
    mentioned_brand VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE shares (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_id INT NOT NULL,
    share_date DATE,
    user_id INT,
    shared_post_url VARCHAR(255),
    share_platform VARCHAR(50)
);
